name: Health Potion
flavor_text: A red potion that restores health when consumed.

name: Mana Potion
flavor_text: A blue potion that restores mana when consumed.

name: Elixir of Life
flavor_text: A rare elixir that significantly restores health.

name: Potion of Shadow
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary invisibility to the drinker.

name: Antidote
flavor_text: A potion that cures poisoning effects.

name: Burn Salve
flavor_text: A salve that soothes burn injuries.

name: Potion of Power
flavor_text: A potion that temporarily increases your strength.

name: Potion of Rock
flavor_text: A potion that temporarily boosts your defense.

name: Potion of Wind
flavor_text: A potion that temporarily enhances your agility.

name: Potion of Wisdom
flavor_text: A potion that temporarily increases your wisdom.

name: Scroll of Fireball
flavor_text: A scroll that allows the casting of a powerful fireball spell.

name: Scroll of Ice Shard
flavor_text: A scroll that enables the casting of an ice shard spell.

name: Scroll of Lightning
flavor_text: A scroll that grants the ability to cast a lightning spell.

name: Scroll of Healing
flavor_text: A scroll that heals wounds when read.

name: Scroll of Cure Poison
flavor_text: A scroll that cures poisoning effects upon reading.

name: Scroll of Shaking
flavor_text: A scroll that summons an earthquake to devastate enemies.

name: Scroll of Teleport
flavor_text: A scroll that teleports the reader to a chosen location.

name: Scroll of Identify
flavor_text: A scroll that identifies the properties of an item when read.

name: Scroll of Shielding
flavor_text: A scroll that grants protective barriers against attacks.

name: Engraved Coin
flavor_text: A shiny gold coin with a pretty engraving, must be a collector's item.

flavor_text: A nugget of pure gold, valuable and coveted.

name: Gemstone
flavor_text: A sparkling gemstone, radiating brilliance.

flavor_text: A sturdy bag filled with gold coins.

name: Pile of Gold
flavor_text: A substantial pile of gleaming gold.

name: Treasure Chest
flavor_text: An ornate chest overflowing with riches.

name: Magic Ring
flavor_text_identified: A ring that enhances the wearer's magical abilities.
flavor_text_unidentified: An accessory shrouded in shadow magic. It needs to be identified.

name: Amulet of Health
flavor_text_identified: An amulet that increases the wearer's vitality and health.
flavor_text_unidentified: An accessory shrouded in shadow magic. It needs to be identified.

name: Torch
flavor_text: A torch that illuminates dark areas.

name: Lockpick
flavor_text: A set of lockpicks, useful for opening locked doors.

name: Rope
flavor_text: A sturdy rope, essential for climbing and traversing gaps.

name: Book of Spells
flavor_text: A tome containing various spells and incantations.

name: Map
flavor_text: A map that reveals the layout of the dungeon.

name: Compass
flavor_text: A compass that aids in navigation through the dungeon.

name: Lantern
flavor_text: A lantern that provides a steady source of light.

name: Healing Herb
flavor_text: A simple herb that can be used to heal minor wounds.

name: Fire Resist Potion
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary resistance to fire.

name: Ice Resist Potion
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary resistance to ice.

name: Poison Resist Potion
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary resistance to poison.

name: Shock Resist Potion
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary resistance to shock.

name: Blind Resist Potion
flavor_text: A potion that grants temporary resistance to being blinded.

name: Scroll of Summoning
flavor_text: A scroll that summons creatures to aid the reader.

name: Scroll of Silence
flavor_text: A scroll that silences enemies, preventing them from casting spells.
